New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored his first World Cup century with 126 not out
Rachin Ravindra recorded his third World Cup century
Pakistan achieved a chase of 342 off 41 overs after rain interruption
Key Match Events: Rain interrupted play twice, leading to a premature end of the game
Pakistan were ahead of the required rate when the match was called off, securing a 21-run victory
Fakhar Zaman and Babar Azam formed a significant partnership of 200 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam praised Fakhar Zaman's performance
Kane Williamson acknowledged Pakistan's deserving win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain, leading to a revised target and a shortened game duration
Pakistan's win marked their first in the World Cup since 2013
